name: A ring of black obsidian
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
